title: My Husband Is Never Satisfied
itunes:title: My Husband Is Never Satisfied
description:
Dear Steve and Shirley, I have been married for almost three years now. My husband and I are intimate at least four days every week. I like to keep things hot and spicy, nothing is ever the same in the bed or wherever we chose to do it. I do all that I can to please him and I make sure I am pleased as well. Our sex is always amazing, but, he has confessed to being unfaithful during our entire marriage.................

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
